label: Bee Creeper
description: Any Creeper spawned in flower forests, oak or birch forests will become Bee Creepers!

label: Satanic Trident
description: Recolors the Trident with colors straight from hell!

label: Diamond Trident
description: Recolors the Trident to be themed with the rest of the Diamond Tools.

label: Stever Stand
description: Adds a cool steve head to the Armor Stand.

label: Anniversary Beds
description: Changes all the bed pillows to appear Golden themed.

label: Death Capped
description: Changes everything Brown Mushroom to Death Cap Mushroom.

label: Netherite Shields
description: You can rename shields to '<material> shield' and it will change. List of materials can be found in the files.

label: Netherite Elytra
description: Recolors Elytra to appear like Netherite.

label: Bee Strider
description: Striders become BEES!

label: Basaltite
description: Netherite Tools become Basalt themed.

label: Emeraldite
description: Netherite Tools become Emerald themed.

label: Sun's Grace
description: Netherite Tools become Sun's Grace themed

label: Honey Gear - Netherite
description: Netherite Tools become Sun's Grace themed

label: Honey Gear - Diamond
description: Diamond Tools become Sun's Grace themed

label: Dungeons Dummy
description: Changes Armor Stands to appear like the Dummies from Minecraft: Dungeons.

label: Picowle
description: Cows spawning in certain biomes will become Glowing Pickle Cows

label: Picowle Micro
description: Cows spawning in certain biomes will become Glowing Pickle Cows, with smaller pickles.

label: Picowle Micro+
description: Cows spawning in certain biomes will become Glowing Pickle Cows, with REAL SMALL pickles.

label: UwU Creepers
description: As if those creeplings weren't creepy enough... prepare to get spooked!

label: UwU Language
description: Repalces every 'r' with a 'w'.

label: Armor2Mobs
description: Replaces some mobs to look like armors from Minecraft: Dungeons.

label: Hot Strider
description: Changes the cold strider texture to be red and cozy at all times!

label: Dungeons Lightning Rod+
description: Changes Lightning Rod to look like the one from Minecraft: Dungeons!

label: Ice Wand Lightning Rod+
description: Changes Lightning Rod to look like the Ice Wand from Minecraft: Dungeons!

label: Powder2Quicksand
description: Changes Powder Snow to Quicksand

label: Powder2Mud
description: Changes Powder Snow to Mud from Minecraft: Earth

label: Poopless Horse
description: Removes one of the ugly horse overlays.

label: Redstone Sculk Sensor
description: Changes the Sculk Sensor to be Redstone themed.

label: Redstone Lamp Sculk Sensor
description: Changes the Sculk Sensor to be Redstone themed, but with a lamp instead of torches.

label: Cake is a Lie
description: Changes the Sculk Sensor to appear like a cake, a fake one!

label: Hailstone
description: Changes the Dripstone blocks to Hailstone, an icy alternate version.

label: Bold Muddy
description: Changes the rare black rabbit to Bold Muddy

label: Basalt Buddies
description: Any fox or rabbit who spawn in Basalt Deltas will become EVIL basalt mobs!

label: Bold Muddy Axolotl
description: Changes the rare blue axolotl to Bold Muddy

label: Basalt Elytra
description: Changes the Elytra to appear like Basalt

label: Oinkers MacLin
description: Changes Totem of Undying to Oinkers MacLIn!

label: Earful Zombified Piglin
description: Adds a bone ear to the Zombiifed Piglin.

label: Makeup Glow Squid
description: Removes a weird glow spot on the Glow Squid's Face.

label: Glowy Glow Squid
description: Makes the Glow Squid even more glowier!

label: Prismarine Glow Squid
description: Makes the Glow Squid look prismarine like.

label: Corrupted Beacon
description: Changes the Beacon to look like the Corrupted Beacon from Minecraft: Dungeons.

label: Amethyst Trident
description: Recolors the Trident to be Amethyst Themed, with sounds too!

label: Buzzy Nest
description: Replaces Acacia Signs with the Buzzy Nest from Minecraft: Dungeons

label: Ewan Axolotl
description: Changes the rare blue axolotl to Ewan Howell

label: Love Golem
description: Changes the Iron Golem to be Love Themed

label: Heart Swords
description: Changes the all Swords to a Heart on a Stick

label: Dungeons Bee Creeper
description: Any Creeper spawned in flower forests, oak or birch forests will become Bee Creepers!, but with the Dungeons Creeper

label: Cow Styled Moobloom
description: Any Cow spawned in flower forests or sunflower plains will become a Moobloom, but with the style of the vanilla cow

label: Minecraft: Earth themed Hoods.
description: Moobloom, Bold Rabbit, Cluckshroom, Horned Sheep, Muddy Pig and Earth Hero Hoods.

label: Minecraft: Earth Journal Book
description: Rename Carved Pumpkin to Earth Journal.

label: Bold Muddy Hood
description: Rename Carved Pumpkin to Bold Muddy Hood

label: Bee Creeper Hood
description: Rename Carved Pumpkin to Bee Creeper Hood

label: Melon Golem Mask
description: Rename Carved Pumpkin to Carved Melon or Angry Carved Melon

label: Arch Illager Crown
description: Rename Carved Pumpkin to Arch Illager Crown

label: Moobloom Styled Cows
description: Changes every cow to appear with the Moobloom design.

label: Corrupted Pumpkin
description: Jack O Lanterns become Corrupted Pumpkins, but you can also rename a Carved Pumpkin to Corrupted Pumpkin.

label: Dungeons Soul Lantern
description: Soul Lanterns are changed to appear like the Artifact from Minecraft: Dungeons.

label: Lush Campfire
description: Spore Blossoms are changed to appear like upside down green flamed campfires.

label: Glow Pickler
description: Changes the Glow Squid to appear like a Sea Pickle.

label: Earth Journal Items
description: Replaces all books with the journal from Minecraft: Earth
